plot: The story of &"Ozploitation&" movies - a time when Australian cinema showed an explosion of sex, violence, horror and action. Includes anecdotes, lessons in maverick filmmaking and a genuine love of Australian movies. It moves through Aussie genre cinema of the 70s and early 80s - claiming it's an unjustly forgotten cinematic era of boobs, pubes, tubes... and even a little kung fu.   Written by  Anonymous
title: Not Quite Hollywood: The Wild, Untold Story of Ozploitation!
